title: Detox Your Life Now and Awaken Your Inner Spirit Eguide
author: Rhonda
description: Detox your life now and awaken your inner spirit eguide will lead you through concrete steps to bring more peace, joy, and fulfillment in your life and relationship with God.
sitename: Discover the Healing Power of Christian Meditation
cleaned_text: For the past few months I have been working on a new program that incorporates my Christian meditation and affirmation recordings to help believers bring balance into all areas of their life as they deepen their relationship with God. My new 10-week program is called Detox Your Life Now and Awaken Your Inner Spirit and should be available the week of April 12, 2010. To learn more and sign up for pre-launch
